text: 1.27 Ais 1.16-17, 58.6-7, Mat 25.36, Lom 12.2, 1 Jo 5.18 Pen nɨbi God nop kɨdek gɨl, nop kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgep ak yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl gɨlɨg, Bapi God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek ma yonɨgun agɨl, anɨgɨnɨmɨb. Ñapay amoñɨluk okok sek, bin kaŋɨl okok sek mɨŋel dɨpal okok, kɨlop amɨl nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨnɨmɨb. Pen abe, gos binɨb lum awl nepal ak, gos anɨb ak nɨbop gek God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek ma yenɨmɨb.
